ActCanada Shipping Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the OIL POLLUTION PREVENTION REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) which remove the supervision of transfer operations at loading and unloading facilities and amend provisions of the Regulations which are ultra vires the Canada Shipping Act.
